sitreper 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Delimit in space and time

sitrep_delimit_metadata.Rd

Create metadata and filter by time and space

sitrep_delimit_metadata(data_raw_name_string, week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_eval(data, week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_var, space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_make(data, week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_var, space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_eval_free(data, ..., week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_count(data, week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_var, space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_filter(data, week_var, week_ini = "2020-W01",
  week_fin = "today", space_var, space_num = 4)

sitrep_delimit_spacetime_count_free(data, ..., week_var,
  week_ini = "2020-W01", week_fin = "today", space_num = 4)

Arguments

data_raw_name_string

filename as string "data-raw/ficha_GB_26Feb20_09_52.xls"
week_ini

week ini
week_fin

week fin
space_num

number of administrative units
data

outcome
space_var

define the administrative unit variable
...

more spatial covariates
week_var

define the week time variable. it must be in aweek::date2week(date, week_start = "Sunday", floor_day = TRUE) format (e.g. "2018-W51")

Value

retorno

Functions

  • sitrep_delimit_metadata: cool to create metadata!

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_eval: create 2 (deprecated) -> now is ..._count

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_make: create 3 (deprecated) -> now is ..._filter

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_eval_free: create 2 free (deprecated) -> now is ..._count_free

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_count: create 2

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_filter: create 3

  • sitrep_delimit_spacetime_count_free: create 2 free

Examples


library(outbreaks)
library(tidyverse)
#> -- Attaching packages -------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 --
#> v ggplot2 3.3.0     v purrr   0.3.3
#> v tibble  2.1.3     v dplyr   0.8.5
#> v tidyr   1.0.0     v stringr 1.4.0
#> v readr   1.3.1     v forcats 0.5.0
#> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.6.3
#> Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 3.6.3
#> Warning: package 'forcats' was built under R version 3.6.3
#> -- Conflicts ----------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() --
#> x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()

library(aweek)
library(sitreper)
#data(package="outbreaks")

mers_korea_2015 %>% summary()
#>          Length Class      Mode
#> linelist 15     data.frame list
#> contacts  4     data.frame list

mers_korea_2015_linelist <- mers_korea_2015 %>%
  pluck("linelist") %>%
  as_tibble() %>%

  # formats for sitreper
  mutate(
    epiweek=date2week(dt_onset, week_start = "Sunday", floor_day = TRUE),
    epiweek_fct=as.factor(epiweek),
    loc_hosp_chr=as.character(loc_hosp)
  )

mers_korea_2015_linelist %>% nrow()
#> [1] 162
mers_korea_2015_linelist %>% count(epiweek)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 2
#>   epiweek      n
#>   <aweek>  <int>
#> 1 2015-W19     1
#> 2 2015-W20    19
#> 3 2015-W21    17
#> 4 2015-W22    72
#> 5 2015-W23    25
#> 6 2015-W24     1
#> 7 NA          27
mers_korea_2015_linelist %>% count(loc_hosp,sort = T)
#> # A tibble: 13 x 2
#>    loc_hosp                                                                n
#>    <fct>                                                               <int>
#>  1 Samsung Medical Center, Seoul                                          80
#>  2 Pyeongtaek St. Mary, Hospital, Pyeongtaek, Gyeonggi                    37
#>  3 Dae Cheong Hospital, Daejeon                                           12
#>  4 Konyang University Hospital, Daejeon                                   11

#>  6 Hallym University Medical Center                                        4

#>  8 Hallym University Dongtan Sacred Heart Hospital, Hwaseong, Gyeonggi     3
#>  9 Seoul Clinic, Asan, Chungcheongnam                                      2
#> 10 365 Yeollin Clinic, Seoul                                               1
#> 11 Gangdong Kyuang Hee University Hospital                                 1
#> 12 Konkuk University hospital                                              1
#> 13 Pyeongtaek fraternity hospital                                          1

mers_korea_2015_linelist %>%
  sitrep_delimit_spacetime_filter(week_var = epiweek_fct,
                                  week_ini = "2015-W20",
                                  week_fin = "2015-W21",
                                  space_var = loc_hosp_chr,
                                  space_num = 4)
#> # A tibble: 20 x 18
#>    id      age age_class sex   place_infect reporting_ctry loc_hosp dt_onset

#> #   dt_start_exp <date>, dt_end_exp <date>, dt_diag <date>, outcome <fct>,
#> #   dt_death <date>, epiweek <aweek>, epiweek_fct <fct>, loc_hosp_chr <chr>

mers_korea_2015_linelist %>%
  sitrep_delimit_spacetime_count_free(sex,
                                      age_class,
                                      week_var = epiweek_fct,
                                      week_ini = "2015-W22",
                                      week_fin = "2015-W23",
                                      space_var = loc_hosp_chr,
                                      space_num = Inf)
#> # A tibble: 38 x 4
#>    sex   age_class space_var                                               n
